Addition / Subtraction.hint: Draw a number line and count forward or backward to solve the problem.
Split the numbers into tens and ones, add/subtract each part, then combine.
Round one number to the nearest ten, do the operation, then adjust the difference.

Multiplication / Division.hint: Count by multiples of the number to find the answer.
Add the same number repeatedly to reach the total.
Draw rows and columns to visualize multiplication.

Fractions.hint: Draw shapes divided into equal parts to see the fraction.
Place fractions on a number line to compare or add/subtract them.

Measurement.hint: Measure objects using a ruler or tape measure carefully.
Estimate by comparing with something you know the length of.

Perimeter / Area.hint: Add the lengths of all sides to find perimeter.
Multiply length by width to find area of rectangle.

Place Value.hint: Visualize tens, ones, hundreds using blocks.
Break numbers into hundreds, tens, and ones to understand place value.
